description: Grupo Smile, founded in 2019, is a restaurant group in Bogot√° that emphasizes sustainability and quality dining experiences. With four diverse restaurants and a catering service, the initiative aims to provide healthy food while positively impacting the community. The group focuses on responsible sourcing, employee growth, and environmental practices, striving to become a certified B Corp. Their mission is to nurture people through quality food and experiences that foster personal and social development.
name: Grupo Smile
